text: The Senate wants to make daylight saving time permanent—but that could leave Americans with less sleep and worse health
title: Kanye West Gives Kim Kardashian West Stock in Disney, Amazon, Netflix

meta_data.description: Kim Kardashian West shared Kanye's gift on Instagram: Stock in Apple, Netflix, Amazon, Adidas, and Disney.
meta_data.keywords: Kanye West, Kim Kardashian West, Apple, Amazon, Netflix, Disney, Adidas, stock, tech, shoes

og.title: Kanye West Gives Kim Kardashian West Stock in Amazon, Apple, Disney and More for Christmas
og.description: The Walt Disney stock alone is valued at over $100,000.
